name: 战术狂想3-枪战足球(Chimera of Tactics 3-Gun and Soccer)
name_original: 战术狂想3-枪战足球(Chimera of Tactics 3-Gun and Soccer)
description:
Game FeaturesThis is a gun and soccer SLG, player need to command team members to grab soccer with gun and shoot at the goal! ╰(*°▽°*)╯Game FlowRandomly generate the entire game.
Any role can pass the soccer to a teammate after touching the soccer or attack enemy dribbling role to grab the soccer.
The role killed by attack will be resurrected in a random position around its own goal role after a certain period of time.
The dribbling role can shoot at the goal after close to the enemy goal.Attack Damage The attack damage is mainly determined by the weapon attacks times, the hit rate of a single attack, the damage of a single attack, whether to attack from the back of the target, and the weapon critical strike rate.
Attack hit rate is mainly determined by weapon hit rate, distance to target and target avoidance rate.
developers: 自由愉悦小黄猫(Free pleasure little yellow cat)
publishers: 自由愉悦小黄猫(Free pleasure little yellow cat)
